weather.question: I fall from the sky. You need an umbrella when I come down. What am I?

hints.text: ☔️ You wear a raincoat when I fall.

weather.question: I am bright and yellow and hot! I make you feel warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I am in the sky during the day.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I am out.
🍦 I can melt your ice cream!

weather.question: I am cold and white. I fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need mittens when I am falling.
🌨️ I am made of frozen water.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees. Sometimes I can be strong! What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can whoosh through your hair.

weather.question: I am white and float in the sky. Sometimes I look like animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I rumble and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can see me mostly at night.

weather.question: Sometimes after rain, I appear in the sky with many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ I need the sun and rain to exist.
✨ You can’t touch me, but you can see me.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of wind and rain, that forms over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Sometimes, people need to leave their homes when I come.

weather.question: When it's very cold outside, water can turn into me on the grass and leaves. I am like tiny needles of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 You find me outside in the morning when it's cold.

weather.question: I am a warm wind that can melt snow quickly and cause floods. I am named after a thing you do with your mouth, what am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ My name sounds like something you do to cool your soup.
⛰️ I often come down from the mountains.
🌊 I can make rivers rise quickly.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?
I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I have black and white spots.
🥛 I make milk for your cereal.

animal.question: I oink and love to roll in mud. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?
I have a long neck and spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves from tall trees.

animal.question: I roar and have a mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am the king of the jungle.
🦁 The boy cat has a mane.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be long or short.
